Emissary's Onslaught.name: Emissary's Onslaught
Emissary's Onslaught.flavor: As your weapon clashes against your foe, a thunderclap resounds and empowers all your nearby allies.
Emissary's Onslaught.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage. Each ally within 2 squares of the target gains a bonus to his or her next attack roll against that target equal to your Constitution modifier.
Emissary's Onslaught.special: If there are more enemies than allies within 10 squares of you, the bonus to attack rolls increases by 2. Count only active enemies and allies, not unconscious, dead, or dying creatures.

Emissary's Gambit.name: Emissary's Gambit
Emissary's Gambit.flavor: You hearten your ally to turn the odds in the fight to your advantage.
Emissary's Gambit.effect:
Choose one of the following benefits.
• The target gains a bonus to its next attack roll equal to the number of enemies and allies you can see (maximum 10).
• The target rolls a saving throw with a bonus equal to the number of enemies and allies you can see (maximum 10).
Count only active enemies and allies, not unconscious, dead, or dying creatures.

Army of the Emissary.name: Army of the Emissary
Army of the Emissary.flavor: With a thrilling battle cry, you exploit your allies’ numbers to defeat your foes swiftly.
Army of the Emissary.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you gains a bonus to attack rolls and to all defenses equal to the number of your allies within 5 squares of you.
